title: rpcdaemon err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `tg version 2021.05.1-alpha`
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Commit hash : `master 793c13e20efe8c752ad628e8ffbc98e10c71f79c`

#### Expected behaviour

Running the `rpcdaemon` should work

#### Actual behaviour

The `rpcdaemon` logs a lot of warnings.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Running `rpcdaemon --datadir $TG_DATADIR --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --ws`

#### Backtrace

````
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.021] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.080] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.100] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.163] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.191] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.211] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.230] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.238] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
WARN [05-04|08:43:33.262] rpc filters, unprocessable payload       err="read Nonce: rlp: expected String or Byte"
````
